title: unaiyallAl gati
sahitya:
unaiyalAl gati yAr ulagilE unai nambinEn shambhO purArE


anupallavi

  sanakAdi munivar pUjai sheyyavaruL candrashEkharA karuNaa sAgarA


caraNam    bhagavan pashupatE parama shiva pArvatIpatE bhuvana patE
guhan yAnai mukhanai Inrava en manam kOvil koNDavA kaDaikkaN pArttaruL
